        Build result object from data position.

        Parameters:
        sub - subbook.
        headPage - page number of a heading.
        headOff - page offset of a heading.
        textPage - page number of an article text.
        textOff - page offset of an article text.

      • getHeading

        public <T> T getHeading(Hook<T> hook)
                 throws EBException

        Returns a heading term.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type to be return from hook.
        Parameters:
        hook - Hook callback object.(default hook if null passed)
        Returns:
        Object that is processed with hook.
        Throws:
        EBException - if file read error is happened.

      • getText

        public <T> T getText(Hook<T> hook)
              throws EBException

        Returns an article text.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type to be return from hook.
        Parameters:
        hook - フック (nullの場合はデフォルトのフック)
        Returns:
        フックによって加工されたオブジェクト
        Throws:
        EBException - ファイル読み込み中にエラーが発生した場合
